scripts.start: NODE_PATH=src/js budo src/js/index.js:dist/bundle.js --host 0.0.0.0 --live -- --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.test: NODE_PATH=src/js mochify --recursive test --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.cover: NODE_PATH=src/js mochify --recursive test --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --report lcovonly ]
scripts.cover-human-readable: NODE_PATH=src/js mochify --recursive test --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --report text ]
